name: Paper Laser
description:
Platafort Games presents their first game: Paper Laser!

Minimalist but beautiful mobile game, Paper Laser comes from the fusion of two simple ideas: a puzzle about circles with lasers between them, and paper-styled graphics and audio. Control circles through a maze with dangerous spikes, portals, traps, and more in order to get inside the safe zones and proceed to next stage!

//

If you liked this demo, make sure to write us your opinions, ideas, suggestions, and bug fix requests to this email: platafortgames@gmail.com, so we can analyze and maybe add them to the game!

//

Platafort is a brazillian indie game producer, which has plans to create and publish lots of games! Currently, we have 4 projects just waiting to start production, but as everything has a beggining, we need some money to start. If you want to help, please donate any value through this game page. Have in mind your donation will help lots of games to be created in the future. Thanks in advance!
